trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for most chart elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示大部分的圖表元素的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Chart elements such as series, chart areas, and legends must have unique names, and reuse the unique name generation and validation logic provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 例如序列、 圖表區域和圖例的圖表項目必須具有唯一的名稱，並重複使用所提供的唯一名稱的產生和驗證邏輯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection%601>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement"></xref> class with the specified chart element name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement"></xref>類別具有指定的圖表項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new chart element.
Gets or sets the name of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表元素的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示圖表元素的名稱。
